trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cooper City
There were no other sightings in Cooper City on or around May 3rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI observed what appeared to be a black balloon floating, but in the flight path that many aircraft fly routinly in the area. It struck me odd that previously a craft flew by with the lights on being that it was just before dusk. With the nakedgeye it apeared to be the size of a half carrot diamond, and had a steady, soundless track NW and smoothly turned west. I went into my home to get binos, (less than 30 sec.) and re-aquired the object still heading west. It was below cloud level and with the binos it was the size of a half of a dime, solid black, no lights, and at first glance looked like a oak leaf, and then the state of Texas. I gave the binos to my wife and she said it looked more like triangle (she was sitting I was standing). That prompted us to do a google search on UFO sittings on found out the have been numerous sitting worldwide of simmilar objects in the last week. about ten minuts later, what appeared to be a passenger jet flew the same pattern, but with binos I did not see any passenger windows, followed by another simmilar jet a minute later. On the next day, at approximatley 5:30pm, two fighter jets flew over the similar flight path. I do reside about 50 miles north of Homestead AFB. but have never seen any jets over my house.
